description.short: Export your Apple Health data for personal analysis with complete privacy control.
description.full:
Health Exporter is a privacy-focused app that allows you to export your Apple Health data for personal analysis. Your data never leaves your device unless you explicitly share it.

ðŸ”’ PRIVACY FIRST
â€¢ Zero network requests - your data stays on your device
â€¢ No third-party dependencies or analytics
â€¢ Open source and fully auditable
â€¢ Optional AES-256-GCM encryption for sensitive data

ðŸ“Š COMPREHENSIVE EXPORT
â€¢ All health data types: heart rate, steps, workouts, sleep, clinical records
â€¢ Export formats: JSON and SQLite database
â€¢ Incremental exports - only new data since last export
â€¢ Handles years of health data efficiently

âš¡ PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZED
â€¢ Streaming architecture prevents memory crashes
â€¢ Background processing support
â€¢ Real-time progress tracking with cancellation
â€¢ Memory usage under 100MB even with large datasets

PERFECT FOR:
â€¢ Personal health data analysis
â€¢ Backup of health information
â€¢ Data portability and ownership
â€¢ Research and tracking projects

REQUIREMENTS:
â€¢ iOS 16.0 or later
â€¢ iPhone or iPad with HealthKit support
â€¢ Some health data in the Health app

Your health data is precious and personal. Health Exporter gives you complete control over it.

features: Export all Apple Health data types

appStoreReview.notes: This app requires HealthKit permissions to function. It exports health data locally with no network requests. The app is privacy-focused and designed for personal data analysis.
